name: Dofus
description: A VAST WORLD JUST WAITING TO BE DISCOVERED! Touchdown in the World of Twelve and set off on a great adventure in DOFUS - an original massively multiplayer online role playing universe where humor goes hand in hand with action-packed, tactical battles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher Processor: Pentium IV 2.8 GHz or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Additional Notes: OpenGL 1.3
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 4Ti or equivalent Network: Broadband Internet connection Additional Notes: OpenGL 1.3
